name: KARTOFELKA
description: Platform of medium complexity, where the main role is played by 'potato'.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1300 MHz Memory: 128 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 20 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP, 7, Vista, 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Celeron 1700 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 30 MB available space
